name: The Moment of Zen by Godwits

metadata.name: The Moment of Zen #1
metadata.description:
EDITION 1 OF 1

Title: The Moment of Zen  
Artist: Godwits  
Year: 2022

The Moment of Zen Collection by Godwits consist of 88 beautifully created artworks which captures the artist perspective of a momentary feeling of zen. 

Zoom-in and you'll find that each numbered work is created with The Godwits signature style of 3D abstract shapes that are layered in a collage to create an illusions of a (Zoom-out) figurative landscape painting. Each experience is interesting & peculiar.

These works are minted as authenticated tokens on Ethereum to show originality and to validate the creation date in case there are copycat works in the future.

Published By: Abstract Art Labs LLC  
Smart Contract By Manifold / Token Type: ERC-1155  
Artist Royalty: 10%

Limited to personal non-commercial use and resale rights of NFT are granted. All other terms & rights are reserved to Abstract Art Labs LLC
